displayName: LOLBAS ilasm (via cmdline) by SOC Prime Team
description: Detects use of ilasm.exe as a living off the land technique. Author: SOC Prime Team. Rule ID: 39a066dd-471e-4a95-97cc-90f3bc2c5b53. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md. Reference: https://tdm.socprime.com/tdm/info/Yzv4a5Ail70e.
query: SecurityEvent |  where EventID == 4688 | where NewProcessName endswith @'\ilasm.exe' | extend AccountCustomEntity = TargetUserName | extend HostCustomEntity = Computer | extend IPCustomEntity = IpAddress
